byline.original: By LAURA KASINOF and ROBERT F. WORTH
byline.contributor: Laura Kasinof reported from Sana, Yemen, and Robert F. Worth from Washington. Anthony Shadid contributed reporting from Istanbul and Sarah Lyall from London.

snippet: When Tawakkol Karman was awarded the prize, she became a standard-bearer for the Arab Spring and for the role of women across the Middle East.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: When Tawakkol Karman was awarded the prize, she became a standard-bearer for the Arab Spring and for the role of women across the Middle East.

headline.main: Among 3 Women Awarded Nobel Peace Prize, a Nod to the Arab Spring
headline.print_headline: Among 3 Women Awarded Nobel Peace Prize, a Nod to the Arab Spring
